Melchana stared at her astonished.

Melchana: You're a Decepticon?!? A techno-organic Decepticon?!? That
is... special to say the least.

A signal came on her communicator.

Melchana: Clear. You can come. I made contact and am finding things out.

First, a monkey-looking bot came down. Seconds later, a huge bot
leaped and landed near there. He came closer and bowed his head.

Belthassan: Hi. I'm Belthassan, leader of the Tripredacus Prophets.
Welcome to the New Cybertron!

Melchana: Bel, she's a Decepticon. She did mention Vector Sigma. You
think that...?

Belthassan looked at the feline transformer for a moment.

Belthassan: Possibly... Please, tell us more about you. Who were you
before?
